src:
AP Top Massachusetts Headlines at 1:52 a.m. EDT
01 Nov 2019, 04:00 by EndPlay
Trooper charged in ARV shooting pleads not guilty
ACLU sues FBI, DEA for facial recognition records
Thousands lose power as severe thunderstorms sweep north
Guilty verdict in trench collapse case that killed 2 workers
Police: Mayoral candidate egged neighbor's home
Elite runner's close call inspires road safety campaign
Money from Trahan campaign came from joint account
Germany's president wraps up US charm offensive in Boston
Copyright 2019 The Associated Press. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.
